title: Hike
body: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Corcovado National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site renowned as one of Earth's most biodiverse sanctuaries. Experience close encounters with exotic wildlife, trek through pristine rainforest, and discover hidden waterfalls in this natural paradise.

title: Fishing
body: Discover world-class sport fishing in the pristine waters of Puerto Jiménez. Whether you're casting lines in the crystal-clear Pacific Ocean or exploring serene river systems, our waters offer exceptional opportunities for both novice and experienced anglers to catch prized game fish.

title: Kayaking
body: Navigate through stunning mangrove forests and serene waterways in Puerto Jiménez's premier kayaking destinations. Our diverse network of rivers and protected coves offers both peaceful nature exploration and exciting adventures for paddlers of all skill levels.

title: Snorkeling
body: Dive into the vibrant underwater world of the Golfo Dulce, where crystal-clear waters reveal an extraordinary marine ecosystem. Swim alongside tropical fish, observe graceful sea turtles, and explore colorful coral reefs in one of Costa Rica's most pristine marine environments.
